mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_patent tp where 1 = 1

select tp.patent_sn , tp.lang_code , tp.ctgry_code , ( select code_nm from tb_code where code_se = 'PATENT_CTGRY_CODE' and code = tp.ctgry_code ) ctgry_code_nm , ( select code_nm_ko from tb_code where code_se = 'PATENT_CTGRY_CODE' and code = tp.ctgry_code ) ctgry_code_nm_ko , ( select code_nm_en from tb_code where code_se = 'PATENT_CTGRY_CODE' and code = tp.ctgry_code ) ctgry_code_nm_en , tp.nation_code , ( select code_nm from tb_code where code_se = 'PATENT_NATION_CODE' and code = tp.nation_code ) nation_code_nm , ( select code_nm_ko from tb_code where code_se = 'PATENT_NATION_CODE' and code = tp.nation_code ) nation_code_nm_ko , ( select code_nm_en from tb_code where code_se = 'PATENT_NATION_CODE' and code = tp.nation_code ) nation_code_nm_en , tp.patent_cn , tp.regist_dt , tp.register_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tp.register_sn ) register_nm , tp.updt_dt , tp.updusr_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tp.updusr_sn ) updusr_nm from tb_patent tp where 1 = 1
order by tp.regist_dt desc, tp.patent_sn desc
order by tp.patent_sn desc

select tp.patent_sn , tp.lang_code , tp.ctgry_code , ( select code_nm from tb_code where code_se = 'PATENT_CTGRY_CODE' and code = tp.ctgry_code ) ctgry_code_nm , tp.nation_code , ( select code_nm from tb_code where code_se = 'PATENT_NATION_CODE' and code = tp.nation_code ) nation_code_nm , tp.patent_cn , tp.regist_dt , tp.register_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tp.register_sn ) register_nm , tp.updt_dt , tp.updusr_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tp.updusr_sn ) updusr_nm from tb_patent tp where tp.patent_sn = #{patentSn}
